title: Keep your pet warm indoors
description: Ensure your pet has a cozy bed away from cold drafts or tile floors. Use blankets or pet-safe heating pads if necessary.

title: Limit outdoor time
description: During harsh winter weather, keep walks shorter and avoid icy surfaces that can injure paws.

title: Use pet-safe antifreeze
description: Many antifreeze products are toxic to pets. Always store them safely and clean spills immediately.

title: Moisturize paws regularly
description: Apply pet-safe balms to protect their paw pads from cracking due to cold and salt.

title: Keep them hydrated
